thread.title: Great Place!
thread.title_full: Great Place! - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dkszabo
title: Great Place!
text: Stayed here at the beginning of February with a friend. Great Midtown location,very slick interior, great staff! Rooms a bit on the small side but very well laid out...not a problem, as I only used the room to stare at the back of my eyelids all night and shower in the morning. Gorgeous roof top lounge!! I would certainly not only stay here again, but I would also highly recommend The Archer Hotel to friends.
